Class RestParameterReplayListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener

    ParameterReplayToChunkedTransferEncoder

    public abstract class RestParameterReplayListener
extends RestReplayListener
    Filters the replay of parameters. Extracted in an abstract class because it's used in multiple places

        public List<ParameterValueWithId> filter(List<ParameterValueWithId> params)
        Description copied from class: RestReplayListener
        Override to filter out some replay data. Null means excluded. (which also means it will not be counted towards the pagination).
